children.subject: No definitely not automatic, I know several people who also were just below the mark and were able to appeal successfully. You should definitely try appealing; you may have a good shot at still getting in! I am not familiar with the process but I've been told it's like making a case for why you should be admitted to the major (your passion for it, involvement on campus or outside, maybe your obstacles in trying to get a 3.3 and how you've grown from it, etc.) Good luck!!!

history.content: I just finished cs 70 this summer and will only have gotten a 3.2 in the 3 prereq classes to declare. I got B+ in 61A, B in 61B, and B+ in CS70. Am I going to be rejected automatically?
history.subject: GPA cap 3.3
